validering.maksLengde: You can write a maximum of 1000 characters

hendelse.soknad_videresendt_uten_norg_enhet: The application with documentation has been forwarded to and received by another Nav office. The forwarding process will not delay the processing time.
hendelse.soknad_videresendt_med_norg_enhet: The application with documentation has been forwarded to and received by <norsk>{arg}</norsk> municipality. The forwarding process will not delay the processing time.
hendelse.soknad_kan_ikke_vise_status_med_tittel: We cannot show the status of your application for <norsk>{arg}</norsk> on nav.no.
hendelse.soknad_kan_ikke_vise_status_uten_tittel: We cannot show the status of your application on nav.no.

hendelse.sak_kan_ikke_vises_status_uten_tittel: We cannot show the status of your application on nav.no.
hendelse.antalle_sendte_vedlegg: You have submitted {count, plural, =1 {a document} other {# documents}} to Nav.
hendelse.vilkar_oppdatert: Your conditions have been updated; please see the notice of decision for more information.
hendelse.brev_om_saksbehandlingstid: You have received a letter with information about the processing time of your application.
hendelse.etterspor_mer_dokumentasjon: We need more information to process your application.
hendelse.etterspor_ikke_mer_dokumentasjon: We have reviewed your information and will let you know if we need anything else from you.
hendelse.dokumentasjonkrav: Your tasks have been updated; please see the notice of decision for more information.

status.soknad_behandles_ikke_ingress: We cannot show the status of your application on nav.no. This could be because your application is being processed with another application you have submitted, or because you have withdrawn your application. If you have questions, please contact your Nav office.
status.sak_behandles_ikke_ingress: We cannot show the status of your application on nav.no. This could be because your application is being processed with another application you have submitted, or because you have withdrawn your application. If you have questions, please contact your Nav office.
status.ikke_innsyn_ingress: Your application will be processed, but we cannot show the status of your application on nav.no. If you have questions, please contact your Nav office.

tittel.tekst: Please see your notice of decision to see if requirements apply, or if we need more information to make payments to you.

vilkar.beskrivelse: Requirements are activities you must participate in as part of your follow-up from Nav.

dokumentasjonskrav.beskrivelse: This documentation may be related to your requirements, or Nav may need documentation from you in order to make payments to you. You can submit the information under “Your documents” below.

oppgaver.maa_sende_dok_veileder: We need additional documentation for your application.
oppgaver.maa_sende_dok: Your application is missing some documentation
oppgaver.innsendelsesfrist: Final date of submission is {innsendelsesfrist, date, long}
oppgaver.innsendelsesfrist_passert: The final date for submission was {innsendelsesfrist, date, long}
oppgaver.veileder_trenger_mer: We need more documentation from you in order to process your application. If you have submitted the documentation to your Nav office, you can disregard this notice.
oppgaver.last_opp_vedlegg_ikke: Below is an overview of the documentation you did not submit with your application. We recommend that you submit the documentation as soon as possible. If you have submitted the documentation to your Nav office, you can disregard this notice.
oppgaver.hjelp_last_opp: Do you need help submitting information?

modal.overskrift: Do you need help submitting documentation?

bolk1.tittel: Are we not accepting the document that you are trying to submit?
bolk1.avsnitt1: Then you can check whether the attachment is under 10 MB, or is locked with a password.

bolk2.avsnitt1: If you have documentation on paper, you can scan it and send it digitally. Scanned documentation will be of better quality and easier to read.
bolk2.avsnitt2: Using a scanning app, you can use the camera on your mobile phone to scan the documentation. You can compile several paper pages into one digital attachment, for example your tenancy agreement.
bolk2.avsnitt3: You can also take a photo of the documentation you have on paper with your mobile phone. You can attach the images when you send attachments from your mobile phone. If you use a PC, you can send the images to yourself by e-mail, then upload them to nav.no.

bolk3.avsnitt1: If you wish to send documentation from another website, download the content if possible. For example, the tax returns and decisions from the Norwegian State Educational Loan Fund can be downloaded as PDF files. Avoid taking pictures of a PC screen with a camera.

bolk4.tittel: Make sure the documentation you send can be read
bolk4.avsnitt1: It is important that you check that the documentation you upload is complete and can be read on the screen. If it is difficult to read the information, we may ask you to re-send it.

oppgaver.neste_frist: The next submission date is {innsendelsesfrist, date, long}
oppgaver.neste_frist_passert: The final date for submission was {antall_dager} days ago, on {innsendelsesfrist, date, long}
oppgaver.beskjed: You will be notified if we need something from you
oppgaver.andre_dokumenter: Do you have any additional documentation you would like to send?
oppgaver.andre_dokumenter_beskjed: You can send additional documentation under the tab "Your documents" below.

vilkar.veileder_trenger_mer: Requirements are activities you must participate in as part of your follow-up from Nav.

dokumentasjonkrav.veileder_trenger_mer: This documentation may be related to your requirements, or Nav may need documentation from you in order to make payments to you.

vedlegg.lovlig_format: We only accept files that are PDF, JPG or PNG.
vedlegg.minst_ett_vedlegg: You must first select the document you want to submit.
vedlegg.ulovlig_en_filnavn_feilmelding: {filnavn} uses unsupported characters and was not added:
vedlegg.ulovlig_en_filstorrelse_feilmelding: {filnavn} is too big and was not added:
vedlegg.ulovlig_flere_fil_feilmelding: Sorry, we could not add your files. We don´t support the filetype for {antallFiler} files:
vedlegg.ulovlig_filnavn_feilmelding: The file name may only contain the letters a–å, the numbers 0–9 and the characters - _ . , ( )
vedlegg.ulovlig_filstorrelse_feilmelding: The file size must be under 10 MB.
vedlegg.ulovlig_storrelse_av_alle_valgte_filer: We cannot accept your documentation if their combined size exceeds 150 MB.
vedlegg.opplasting_feilmelding: We cannot forward your documentation. Please remove and correct the above files
vedlegg.opplasting_backend_feilmelding: Sorry, we were unable to forward your documentation. Please try again later.
vedlegg.opplasting_backend_virus_feilmelding: Your upload was stopped by our antivirus software. Please try again with a different file.
vedlegg.opplasting_feilmelding_COULD_NOT_LOAD_DO: Sorry, we are unable to open this PDF, please try again with another file.
vedlegg.opplasting_feilmelding_PDF_IS_SIGNED: This PDF is read-only, and we cannot process it.
vedlegg.opplasting_feilmelding_PDF_IS_ENCRYPTED: This PDF is password-protected, and we cannot process it.
vedlegg.opplasting_feilmelding_ILLEGAL_FILE_TYPE: The file type must be JPG, PNG or PDF.
vedlegg.opplasting_feilmelding_ILLEGAL_FILENAME: The file name may only contain the letters a–å, the numbers 0–9 and the characters - _ . , ( )
vedlegg.opplasting_feilmelding_FILE_TOO_LARGE: The file size must be under 10 MB
vedlegg.opplasting_feilmelding_COMBINED_FILES_TO: We cannot accept your documentation if their combined size exceeds 150 MB
vedlegg.opplasting_feilmelding_TOO_MANY_FILES: We only accept up to 20 files at a time
vedlegg.suksess: Thank you! Your documentation have been submitted.

andre_vedlegg.type: Would you like to submit documentation?
andre_vedlegg.tilleggsinfo: You can submit several documents that you think are important for your application. You can take photos and screenshots.

common.forelopigSvar: You have received a letter with information about the processing time of your application.

driftsmelding.innsynDeaktivert: Sorry, we cannot display the status of your application. You can still submit documentation on nav.no. If you have questions, please contact your Nav office.
driftsmelding.ettersendelseDeaktivert: Sorry, we cannot receive your documentation. Please try again later, or submit them to your Nav office.
driftsmelding.innsynOgEttersendelseDeaktivert: Sorry, we cannot display the status of your application or receive your documentation. Please try again later, or contact your Nav office.
driftsmelding.kanIkkeSendeVedlegg: Sorry, we are experiencing system error. Please submit your documentation to your Nav office.

vedlegg.feiledeDigisosIder: Sorry, you cannot submit documentation for this application digitally. Please submit your documentation to your Nav office.
vedlegg.vedleggMangler: Unfortunately, you can not submit documentation to this application.

driftsmelding.feiledeDigisosIder: Sorry, we cannot display the status of your application or recieve your documentation for this application digitally. Please submit your documentation to your Nav office.

feilmelding.soknadStatus_innlasting: We were unable to load the status of your application
feilmelding.saksStatus_innlasting: We were unable to load the status of your cases
feilmelding.dineOppgaver_innlasting: We were unable to load information about your tasks
feilmelding.historikk_innlasting: We were unable to load your history
feilmelding.vedlegg_innlasting: We were unable to load your submitted documentation
feilmelding.ressurs_innlasting: We were unable to load all the information on this page. Try reloading the page or try again later.
feilmelding.saksOversikt: We were unable to load all the information on this page.
feilmelding.saksOversikt2: Try reloading the page or try again later.

endringer.detaljer: Tell us if your financial situation changes.

klage.detaljer: If you have received a notice of decision that you believe is wrong, you can complain.

papirskjema.sammendrag: If you disagree with the decision of your application, you can appeal.
papirskjema.beskrivelse_2: which you can send as documentation to your application.
papirskjema.mer_info_url_tekst: You can read more about the appeal

personopplysninger.detaljer: How we process your personal data

tilgang.info: We are sorry, you cannot use the digital application for financial assistance. Please contact your local Nav office for assistance with the application.

ingen_soknad.tittel: We cannot find any applications from you
ingen_soknad.info: This could be because your municipality cannot show applications submitted on paper, or your application is older than 15 months.

lenke.saksbehandling: How long will it take to process the application?

varsling.forlater_siden_uten_aa_sende_inn_vedlegg: This page is asking you to confirm that you want to leave — information you’ve entered may not be saved.

soknaderUtenVedlegg.forside: During the period from 11.4.24 at 15:00 to 12.4.24 at 12:15, we experienced technical problems. Applications that were sent during this period and had documentation have failed in the reception to the municipality. It will not be possible to upload new documentation to this application. Please contact your local Nav office for help. We apologize for the inconvenience this causes.
soknaderUtenVedlegg.statusside: Due to a technical error, this application has failed. It will not be possible to upload documentation to this application. Please contact your local Nav office for help. We apologize for the inconvenience this causes.

utbetalinger.inngang: See your financial social assistance payments
utbetalinger.utbetalingerIngress: You may have tasks related to your follow-up from Nav. If you have applied on paper, we cannot always show your payments. Read more in the decision letter you receive from Nav. If you have any questions, please contact us by phone at 55 55 33 33.
utbetalinger.tidligereIngress: You can see your payments for the last 15 months here. If you have applied on paper, we cannot always show your payments. If you have any questions, please contact us by phone at 55 55 33 33.

filter.ugylding: The date should be in the format  dd.mm.yyyy
filter.tidligstFra: The earliest search date is 15 months back
filter.fraEtterTil: The From date cannot be after the To date

tilEtterFra: The To date cannot be before the From date

feil.fetch: Something went wrong when we tried to retrieve your payments. Please try again later.

ingen.filter: We could not find any payments for selected filtering

default.tidligere: We could not find any payments for the last 15 months
default.nye: We could not find any payments for current or coming months

utbetalinger.soknadLenke: Go to the application and read the decision letter for more details

utbetalinger.tittel: We cannot find any payments for financial assistance
utbetalinger.nøkkelpunkt1: your application is still being processed
utbetalinger.nøkkelpunkt2: you were not granted what you applied for support for
utbetalinger.nøkkelpunkt3: your municipality cannot show payments for application submitted on paper

ingen-utbetalinger.tittel: We cannot find any payments for financial assistance
ingen-utbetalinger.body: This could be because you have not applied for financial assistance, your municipality cannot show payments for applications submitted on paper, or your payments are older than 15 months.
